page.title: 18MEADOWAYS NURSERY,B. CLEEVE
page.content: Meadoways Nursery,Bishop's Cleeve is owned by Mr.Cotton who sells plants and flowers.The 14 employees do potting,weeding,training and spraying. Mr. Cotton bought the Nursery in 1977. The Nursery covers 14 acres.They stock 1,000,000 plants in containers. Mr.Cotton feeds the plants on slow release and compound fertilizer. He buys seeds from Evesham.Mr.Cotton buys new varieties from Holland,Belgium, Germany,Denmark and New Zealand. The plants are watered automatically.Mr. Cotton starts his work at 6.00am and finishes late at night.In the Nursery shop he sells pots,peat,fertilizers and pesticides.He sells most of the plants to private gardens. He learnt about gardening when he was young,then he went to College. The busiest day of the week is Saturday.The busiest day of the year is Easter Monday.
